fields.label: العنوان
fields.englishDescription: This title will be displayed above the introduction text.
fields.description: سيتم عرض هذا العنوان فوق النص المقدمة

fields.label: مقدمة النص
fields.englishDescription: This text will be displayed before the quiz starts.
fields.description: سيتم عرض هذا النص قبل أن تبدأ هذه المسابقة

fields.label: صورة الخلفية
fields.englishDescription: An optional background image for the introduction.

semantics.label: صورة الخلفية
semantics.englishDescription: An optional background image for the Question set.

semantics.label: نسبة النجاح
semantics.englishDescription: Percentage of Total score required for passing the quiz.
semantics.description: النسبة المئوية لمجموع النقاط المطلوبة لاجتياز الاختبار

fields.label: نص التقدم
fields.englishDescription: Text used if textual progress is selected.
fields.description: النص المستخدم إذا تم تحديد التقدم نصيا

fields.englishLabel: Label for jumping to a certain question
fields.label: Label for jumping to a certain question
fields.englishDescription: You must use the placeholder '%d' instead of the question number, and %total instead of total amount of questions.
fields.description: You must use the placeholder '%d' instead of the question number, and %total instead of total amount of questions.

semantics.label: Disable backwards navigation
semantics.englishDescription: This option will only allow you to move forward in Question Set
semantics.description: This option will only allow you to move forward in Question Set

semantics.label: Randomize questions
semantics.englishDescription: Enable to randomize the order of questions on display.
semantics.description: Enable to randomize the order of questions on display.

fields.label: Override "Retry" button
fields.englishDescription: Text displayed on end page when "Display results" is disabled
fields.description: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: Feedback heading
fields.englishDescription: This heading will be displayed at the end of the quiz when the user has answered all questions.
fields.description: This heading will be displayed at the end of the quiz when the user has answered all questions.

fields.label: Score display text
fields.englishDescription: Text used to display Total user score. "@score" will be replaced by calculated score, "@total" will be replaced by maximum possible score.
fields.description: Text used to display Total user score. "@score" will be replaced by calculated score, "@total" will be replaced by maximum possible score.

fields.label: Quiz passed greeting
fields.englishDescription: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.
fields.description: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: Passed comment
fields.englishDescription: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.
fields.description: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: Quiz failed title
fields.englishDefault: You did not pass this time.
fields.default: You did not pass this time.
fields.englishDescription: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has failed the quiz.
fields.description: This text will be displayed above the score if the user has failed the quiz.

fields.label: Failed comment
fields.englishDescription: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has failed the quiz.
fields.description: This comment will be displayed after the score if the user has failed the quiz.

fields.label: Passed video
fields.englishDescription: This video will be played if the user successfully passed the quiz.
fields.description: This video will be played if the user successfully passed the quiz.

fields.label: Fail video
fields.englishDescription: This video will be played if the user failes the quiz.
fields.description: This video will be played if the user failes the quiz.

fields.label: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.englishDescription: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
fields.description: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: Override "Retry" button
fields.englishDescription: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
fields.description: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
